scripts.input_moveLeft

Package scripts.input_moveLeft

Move the camera left (positive in the x-axis). More...

Functions

def e
 Event function.

Detailed Description

Move the camera left (positive in the x-axis).

This is hooked by a keypress in pnm.input.inputManager.InputManager
The data passed is a reference to inputManager

Function Documentation

  data 
)

Event function.

True if the event is successful
